lead_paragraph: The widow of Alexander V. Litvinenko, who was poisoned in 2006 with a radioactive isotope, has been blocked in her efforts to secure full disclosure about the circumstances of her husband’s death.

headline.main: A Spy Thriller, Now a Wife’s Endless Pain
headline.print_headline: Spy Thriller Also a Wife's Endless Pain

snippet: The widow of Alexander V. Litvinenko, who was poisoned in 2006 with a radioactive isotope, has been blocked in her efforts to secure full disclosure about the circumstances of her husband’s death....
